channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI unveils its Atlas web browser in a bid to supplant Google as the internet’s universal starting point
item.description: ChatGPT Atlas looks and works much like a standard web browser but infuses generative AI capabilities throughout the experience.

item.title: Few Employer Health Plans Cover Ozempic. This Company Can Help
item.description: Weight loss drugs are in high demand, but most employers can’t shoulder the cost as health care rates skyrocket.

item.title: Novo chairman to step down in board rift over pace of change
item.description: The move is part of a wider shakeup at the maker of Wegovy and Ozempic drugs, with more than half of the board members set to depart.

item.title: Why Gen-Z Is Turning to TikTok for Their Benefits Info
item.description: Millennial and Gen-Z workers grew up online, so perhaps it’s no surprise they’re relying on unusual sources for work-related facts.

item.title: ‘If there’s no bottom rung on the ladder, it’s really hard to leap up’: Nonprofits focused on Gen Z employment get $25m Citi Foundation windfall
item.description: Citi Foundation identified youth employability as the theme for its $25 million Global Innovation Challenge this year.

item.title: Group 7: How one musician outsmarted TikTok’s algorithm to promote her song
item.description: My friend turned to me the other day with a sly smirk and whispered, “Are you also part of Group 7?” I shook my head, unsure of what she meant—feeling...

item.title: Google Reopens NYC Campus After Brief Bedbug Infestation
item.description: The non-software bugs hit the company weeks after Google reined in its so-called “Work from Anywhere” policy.

item.title: Gold and silver prices are plummeting: What that means for ‘safe haven’ assets—and why it’s a good sign
item.description: After a record-setting rally over the past week, commodities traders went all in on a massive gold sell-off on Tuesday. The price of the precious meta...

item.title: Millionaire tax that inspired Mamdani fuels $5.7 billion haul in Massachusetts
item.description: In two years levying a 4% surtax on incomes over $1 million, it's funded bridge repairs, bolstered literacy programs and tackled a transportation defi...

item.title: The Penny Shortage Is Adding Up Frustration Among Small Retailers
item.description: A February presidential order halting the minting of pennies has caused a premature scarcity of the copper coins.

item.title: OpenAI launches Atlas, a (potentially) disruptive web browser
item.description: OpenAI has released a new web browser, the company’s latest bid to become consumers’ chief gateway to the web. The new browser, called ChatGPT Atlas, ...

item.title: Move Over Chrome: OpenAI Launches Atlas Browser
item.description: OpenAI launches web browser to compete with Google Chrome

item.title: Taylor Swift wore a vintage Monterey Bay Aquarium t-shirt. It sparked a $2.3 million fundraiser for sea otters
item.description: Taylor Swift is an economic force all on her own. The superstar’s relationship with Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce brought not only eyeball...

item.title: Coca-Cola third quarter results rise with help from mini cans and premium drinks
item.description: The Coca-Cola Co. said sales of premium beverages and mini cans helped boost its third-quarter results despite tepid demand in the U.S. and elsewhere....

item.title: Salesforce revamps Agentforce to try to pull customers across the gap between AI capabilities and AI adoption
item.description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff acknowledges enterprises need hand-holding to build effective AI agents
